body.p:
A single BCMS PCB can monitor
(2) x 42-pole panelboards, or
(1) x 84-pole panelboard, plus
The main feed(s) associated with each panelboard.
Two sets of up to (14) subfeeds (or up to (10) subfeeds if neutrals are monitored).
Panelboards must have CT strips covering each panelboard circuit. Subfeeds must have CTs connected to an intermediate Resistor Board.
